SELECT A.i_user, A.i_board, B.nick, A.title, A.post, A.addr, A.road, A.ctnt, A.hits, C.cg_nm, A.price, A.thumImage, A.image_1, A.image_2, A.image_3, A.image_4, A.image_5 FROM t_board A
LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user
LEFT JOIN t_category C ON A.i_cg = C.i_cg
WHERE A.i_board = #{i_board}
insert into t_board(i_user, title, i_cg, post, addr, road, price, ctnt) VALUES (${i_user}, '${title}', ${i_cg}, ${post}, '${addr}', '${road}', ${price}, '${ctnt}') RETURNING i_board
mapper.update: UPDATE t_board SET thumImage = '${thumImage}', ${image_1} = '${imageFile}' WHERE i_board = ${i_board}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board_like i_user, i_board VALUES (#{i_user}, #{i_board})
